outcome: Activists gain access to BCI root, causing further chaos in the city.

events.description: Underground activists breach the BCI system's firewall, gaining root-level access and escalating tension in the city.
The hacked BCI system unpredictably raises and lowers citizen scores, causing chaos with services and access rights.
Council struggles to regain control, with conflicting response strategies deepening distrust among the public as protests continue.
Widespread misinformation circulates about the function of BCI, leading to panic buying and fears of further resource scarcity.
